__e: So things were a little different for me growing up.
From what I heard, your childhood wasn't a lot of fun either.
Look, I know growing up was tough.
It's not you, or your family, or your childhood.
Mine drank his way through my childhood and spent his life trying to make it up to me.
I didn't hear from you for your entire childhood, and then thanks for the birthday card that I never got from you for the last 40 years.
I have so many questions about your childhood, I don't even know where to start.
I've heard enough about your childhood to last me a lifetime.
Plenty of things in my childhood that I'd like to forget.
